channel.title: Server is offline?
channel.description: well k i got my no-ip server is checked and i got my run server running but i go on the rune locus and i check if my servers on but it says its offline for some reason and i only can connect to my server by using 0.0.0.0 could someone help me plz

item.title: Server is offline?

item.description:
@slotyscape wrote:

i got a problem i got a linksys router and when i go to applications and gaming i have a prablem i fill in the ports then the protocol but i have a porblem at the ip address i went to protforward.com and it says to put my default gate and this pops up U can not use the router ip, network or broadcast address could someone help me?
